about_the_game:
> is a light rogue-like spell-building looter extraction game. Players must scavenge valuable items on the map while constructing their own spells to fend off waves of enemies, ultimately escaping with their hard-earned loot.

 In each session, players need to carefully manage their inventory, aiming to collect as many valuable items as possible and compete to see who can extract with the highest total value.

 Players can customize their spell effects based on different spells—what exciting interactions might arise between them?
detailed_description:
> is a light rogue-like spell-building looter extraction game. Players must scavenge valuable items on the map while constructing their own spells to fend off waves of enemies, ultimately escaping with their hard-earned loot.

 In each session, players need to carefully manage their inventory, aiming to collect as many valuable items as possible and compete to see who can extract with the highest total value.

 Players can customize their spell effects based on different spells—what exciting interactions might arise between them?
name: 魔法拾荒者

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: > is a light rogue-like spell-building looter extraction game. Players must scavenge valuable items on the map while constructing their own spells to fend off waves of enemies, ultimately escaping with their hard-earned loot.
